title: Tassel
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: braided and knotted
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: White linen tassel with one circular base attached to attached to a slightly larger, pear-shaped base (hanging below). Cores are braided over with linen yarns worked in groups for a basket-weave effect. Around the bases hang tiny braided balls and from the bottom of the pear-shaped base hang a few longer clusters of the tiny braided balls.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tassel.
Medium: linen
Technique: braided and knotted. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-51-68.
